Climate threatened Tuvalu holds election watched by Taiwan, ChinaVoting began on Friday in the tiny Pacific Island nation of Tuvalu in a national election that is being closely watched by China, Taiwan, the US and its ally Australia, amid a tussle for influence in the region. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 03:06:51 GMT FQ27W2CL7NM2RGHFLZ7L5OWSCQ https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/climate-threatened-tuvalu-holds-election-watched-by-taiwan-china-2024-01-26/Kirsty Needham世界亚太地区
Former Credit Suisse APAC asset management head exiting UBS - sourcesFormer asset management head of Credit Suisse in Asia Pacific, Min Huang, is leaving UBS as the bank embarks on reviewing its China business post global leadership changes, three sources with knowledge of the matter said. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 02:37:47 GMT OLI6ZHSUCVJQFMUWHRYZSSUCKA https://www.reuters.com/business/finance/former-credit-switzerland-apac-asset-management-head-exiting-ubs-sources-2024-01-26/Selena Li, Yu Xie商业金融
Asia stocks on track for weekly gain; eyes on US inflation testAsian shares were set on Friday to snap a three-week losing streak, while investors awaited a key reading on U.S. inflation later in the day to gauge the outlook for U.S. rates. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 02:17:00 GMT HTMIJ7UUFBL2FDQFJCKZVN6ZUE https://www.reuters.com/markets/global-markets-wrapup-1-2024-01-26/Rae Wee市场
White House's Sullivan to meet with China's foreign minister in BangkokU.S. National Security Advisor Jake Sullivan will meet with Chinese Foreign Minister Wang Yi in Bangkok on Friday and Saturday, building on a commitment by the two countries' leaders to deepen dialogue between the world's two largest economies. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 02:02:19 GMT FRSXZQ3CWZPP5IQLNVQGJHH3UQ https://www.reuters.com/world/white-houses-sullivan-meet-with-chinas-foreign-minister-bangkok-2024-01-26/Reuters世界
Exclusive: China presses Iran to rein in Houthi attacks in Red Sea, sources sayChinese officials have asked their Iranian counterparts to help rein in attacks on ships in the Red Sea by the Iran-backed Houthis, or risk harming business relations with Beijing, four Iranian sources and a diplomat familiar with the matter said. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 01:02:44 GMT V72J672MHRL2DLBVEDQ2YSLH5Y https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/china-presses-iran-reigns-houthi-attacks-red-sea-sources-say-2024-01-26/Parisa Hafezi, Andrew Hayley世界中东地区
Boeing production woes 'will get resolved' says major customer AvolonBoeing's production difficulties will "get resolved", its 737 MAX 10 aircraft will get certified and the impact of U.S. regulators freezing a planned production ramp-up will be minimal this year, the head of major customer Avolon said. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 00:13:04 GMT XSBOHVPZHNAFOG3GCGEGNUZPI https://www.reuters.com/business/aerospace-defense/boeing-product-woes-will-be-resolved-says-major-customer-avolon-2024-01-26/Reuters商业航空航天与国防
Global economy outlook at odds with aggressive rate cut betsGlobal growth is set to stay resilient this year and only pick up pace a bit in 2025, according to a Reuters poll of economists, a stable outlook at odds with still-relatively aggressive interest rate cut bets in financial markets. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 00:10:50 GMT XBODVAFSI5I3FAOPMZLC26SD5M https://www.reuters.com/markets/global-economy-outlook-odds-with-aggressive-rate-cut-bets-2024-01-26/Hari Kishan市场宏观问题

Chinese music student convicted in US of threatening pro-democracy activistA Chinese music student was convicted on Thursday of U.S. charges that he harassed an activist who posted fliers at the Berklee College of Music in Boston supporting democracy in China and threatened to report her activities to Chinese law enforcement. Thu, 25 Jan 2024 17:36:00 GMT 7WTLPJMDSVIBJBWIBYFOHCQB7Y https://www.reuters.com/world/us/chinese-music-student-convicted-of-throne-us-pro-democracy-activist-2024-01-25/Nate Raymond世界美国
Yastremska happy to avoid qualifiers after Australian Open run endsDayana Yastremska did not feel too dejected by her semi-final defeat at the Australian Open as she knows her run would have boosted her rankings so that she can get direct entry into tournaments rather than playing in the qualifiers. China Evergrande unit to sell entire stake in asset to cut debtChina Evergrande said on Thursday one of its units had entered a deal to sell its entire stake in Shantou Hengmeng Property Development for 137.6 million yuan ($19.20 million).
